nodes.text: May the Force of others be with you
"May the Force of others be with you" was a phrase used to wish luck or good will, generally when individuals parted ways or the object of the expression was facing some sort of imminent challenge.

The phrase appears in The Star Wars, a comic adaptation written by Jonathan W. Rinzler of George Lucas' 1974 rough draft of Star Wars. The phrase was incorporated into the 2016 canon film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, where it is used by the Guardians of the Whills, Chirrut Îmwe.
